children.name: sync_instructions
children.text: Logging in with Facebook will allow you to load your save game on additional devices

children.name: label_new_old
children.text:
This is my old device.

My new device is...

children.name: label_old_description
children.text: Device I want to use to access a different save.

children.name: label_new_description
children.text: Device I want to use to access a different save.

children.name: label_bodytext_2
children.text:
First, make sure the save on your OLD device is linked to Game Center.

Next, sign in with the same Game Center account on this device, and restart the game.

children.name: label_bodytext_2
children.text:
Enter your email address below to recieve a Sync Code you can use to retrieve your game. 

We promise not to spam you.

children.name: label_currentuser
children.text: Current User: User Name Goes Here

children.name: label_bodytext
children.text: Do you want to use this Game Center account with your current save below instead of the old one? You wont be able to use Game Center to log in with the old save anymore.

children.name: label_bodytext_2
children.text: Enter your email address below to recieve a Sync Code you can use to retrieve your game. We promise not to spam you More text can go here. Enter your email address below to recieve a Sync Code you can use to retrieve your game. We promise not to spam you.

children.name: label_modaltext
children.text: Do you want to use this Game Center account with your current save below instead of the old one? You wont be able to use Game Center to log in with the old save anymore.

children.name: label_comingsoonbodytext
children.text: In a coming update, you'll be able to play the same save across both iOS and Android. Stay tuned!
